name: PictureMemory
0:
”Alexa, open Picture Memory”
”Alexa, ask Picture Memory for an easy game”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: picture memory
des:
Note: This game requires an Echo device with a display, preferably an Echo Show, to display pictures and to support touch.

The ideal entertaining pastime for everyone, young or old, who wants to put their memory to the test!

After you have chosen a difficulty level, you will be shown different pictures to remember and when you are ready, Alexa will ask you a question about the previous pictures! For example, a new picture has been added or an existing one is hidden behind a question mark...

Besides 3 levels of difficulty, there is also the new "Infinity Mode" as an exiting premium content, which has no fixed number of rounds, gets more and more difficult, and only ends when you have made two mistakes. Additionally, this new mode also includes a high score with which you can challenge yourself or your friends and family!


We would be very happy if you could take the time to rate this skill.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
